Description: Checks that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, ensuring no duplicate primary keys exist, which is critical for entity integrity.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Verifies that the customer_id field is never NULL, as required by the PRIMARY KEY constraint, ensuring every record can be uniquely identified.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the full_name column, which may be important for customer identification and communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the date_of_birth column, which are important for age verification and regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the gender column, which may be required for demographic analysis or compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the address column, which are important for customer contact and regulatory requirements.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the phone_number column, which are important for customer contact and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the email_address column, which are important for electronic communication and notifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the national_id_or_passport_number column, which may be required for KYC (Know Your Customer) and regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the occupation column, which may be useful for customer profiling and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the customer_type column, which may be important for segmentation and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the account_numbers column, which are important for linking customers to their accounts.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the age column, which may be important for eligibility and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_by column, which is important for audit trails and accountability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_on column, which is important for tracking record creation times.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_by column, which is important for tracking who last updated the record.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_on column, which is important for tracking when a record was last updated.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the status column, which may be important for workflow or state management.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that email_address values follow a basic email format, ensuring validity for communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that phone_number values contain only valid characters (digits, plus, hyphen, space), ensuring contactability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9+\-\s]+$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within an expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), ensuring data consistency.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within an expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), ensuring valid workflow states.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks that age values are non-negative, ensuring logical consistency for customer ages.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Checks that date_of_birth values are not in the future, ensuring logical consistency.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which should be unique for each customer for regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate duplicate customer records or data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate phone_number values, which may indicate duplicate customer records or data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT phone_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY phone_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that created_on is not after modified_on, ensuring logical consistency in record timestamps.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on

Description: Checks that created_on and modified_on timestamps include timezone information, ensuring temporal accuracy across regions.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on::text !~* '\\+|\\-' OR (modified_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on::text !~* '\\+|\\-')

Description: Checks that account_numbers values contain only valid characters (digits, commas, hyphens, spaces), ensuring correct account referencing.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NOT NULL AND account_numbers !~* '^[0-9,\\-\\s]+$'
